TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed ActivationOption extends System.Enum

summary.span: Especifica a maneira como os componentes atendidos são ativados no aplicativo.

span.span: Specifies the manner in which serviced components are activated in the application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A configuração de ativação para o aplicativo padrão será `Library`.The activation setting for the application defaults to `Library`. ## Examples O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra o uso dessa enumeração.The following code example demonstrates the use of this enumeration. [!code-cpp[EnterpriseServices_Basic#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/EnterpriseServices_Basic/CPP/calculator.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[EnterpriseServices_Basic#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/EnterpriseServices_Basic/CS/calculator.cs#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.EnterpriseServices.ActivationOption Library = int32(0)

summary.span: Especifica que os componentes atendidos no aplicativo marcado são ativados no processo do criador.

span.span: Specifies that serviced components in the marked application are activated in the creator's process.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.EnterpriseServices.ActivationOption Server = int32(1)

summary.span: Especifica que os componentes atendidos no aplicativo marcado são ativados em um processo fornecido pelo sistema.

span.span: Specifies that serviced components in the marked application are activated in a system-provided process.
